Package com.magnet.core.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PostConstruct
    Contract for services to implement when they want to know when they have been fully initialized (i.e., injected with it's dependencies).
    PostStarted
    Called for kernel-managed services after the kernel enters the ServicesListener.Event#STARTED state.
    PreDestroy
    Called prior to the [singleton] service maintained in the service register is released.
    RequiredService
    When used on a class declaration, a non-optional declaration has special meaning to the DI machinery.
    Services
    Provides access to the service component registry of the application.
    ServicesLockable
    An extension of ServicesWriteable that supports locking primitives.
    ServicesLookup
    Provides for simple lookup mechanism.
    ServicesWriteable
    An extension of Services that supports dynamic runtime registration for service components.
    Shutdown
    Instances of these are automatically invoked by the services framework before Platform exits.
    Startup
    Instances of these are initialized automatically by the services framework after core Platform initialization has occurred.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Shutdown.Type
